Serialized Form

  • Package engine.core

    • Class engine.core.Display extends java.awt.Canvas implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame
          The window being used for display

        • frameBuffer

          RenderContext frameBuffer
          The bitmap representing the final image to display

        • displayImage

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage displayImage
          Used to display the framebuffer in the window

        • displayComponents

          byte[] displayComponents
          The pixels of the display image, as an array of byte components

        • bufferStrategy

          java.awt.image.BufferStrategy bufferStrategy
          The buffers in the Canvas

        • graphics

          java.awt.Graphics graphics
          A graphics object that can draw into the Canvas's buffers

        • input

          Input input
          The user input received by this display.
